statusLine.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$j = [Console]::In.ReadToEnd() | ConvertFrom-Json; $p = @(); $p += $j.model.display_name; if($j.agent.name){$p += \"[agent: $($j.agent.name)]\"}; try{$b = git branch --show-current 2>$null; if($b){$p += \"git:$b\"}}catch{}; $p += Split-Path -Leaf $j.cwd; if($j.context_window.remaining_percentage){$p += \"ctx:$($j.context_window.remaining_percentage)%\"}; $p -join ' | '"
